name: 黃瀅瑛
objective: The course introduces various applications and examples of VR (virtual reality) and AR (augmented reality) applied in different workspace and its designs. The goal of the course is to empower students in learning VR/AR applications and how to apply the techniques in actual work environments, product development and system designs.
